name: Hefe Schweiz AG Slide lever, dry
description: Hefe Schweiz AG Slide lever, dry continues to produce flavors and aromas while the dough is cooked. DiaHebel can be used with or without baking agent. DiaHebel shortens the working time and brings better taste to bread. This dried lever for improving the quality of smoked and semi-white bread is guaranteed to have no additives.
